# function: files





## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
files(root string, unix bool) list of string
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `root` (String) The root to walk
1. `unix` (Boolean, Nullable) Use unix separators
